metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3509 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Red Hat Ceph Storage 4, in the Dashboard component. In response to CVE-2020-27839, the JWT token was moved from localStorage to an httpOnly cookie. However, token cookies are used in the body of the HTTP response for the documentation, which again makes it available to XSS.The greatest threat to the system is for confidentiality, integrity, and availability. Sergey Bobrov discovered that the Ceph dashboard was susceptible to a cross-site scripting attack. An attacker could use this to expose sensitive information or gain unintended access.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:
